metadata.title: CVE-2015-5733 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in therefreshAdvancedAccessibilityOfItem function in wp-admin/js/nav-menu.js inWordPress before 4.2.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via an accessibility-helper title.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.3+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3+dfsg-1').
